body.name: American Crew Men's Conditioner, Daily Moisturizing Conditioner, Naturally Derived, Vegan Formula, Citrus Mint, 8.45 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 35 mins
features: MOISTURIZING CONDITIONER: Our triple action Daily Moisturizing Conditioner restores, strengthens, and protects. Hair is left feeling soft, manageable, and ready for styling. Suitable for men with normal to dry hair.

HAIR CARE FOR MEN: Effectively detangles and provides essential moisture without weighing hair down, reduces hair breakage from combing by 86%, delivers much-needed hydration and protects hair against dryness.
KEY BENEFITS: Infused with our energizing, naturally certified American Crew Citrus Mint signature fragrance. Silicon free. Vegan.
HOW TO USE: After shampooing, massage a small amount into hair and scalp ensuring it distributes evenly and leave on for 2 - 3 min. Rinse well.
WHO WE ARE: American Crew is a leader in, Men's Grooming for HAIR, BODY, BEARD, SHAVE, STYLE categories. American Crew's ongoing commitment is to elevate men's style and enhance their personal image.
body.description: The Moisturizing Conditioner for Men by American Crew has a triple-action formula that restores, strengthens, and protects your hair, leaving it soft, manageable, and ready for styling. Suitable for normal to dry hair, it detangles and provides essential moisture without weighing it down. With an energizing Citrus Mint fragrance, this vegan and silicone-free conditioner is easy to use. Simply massage it into your hair and scalp, leave it on for 2-3 minutes, and rinse well. Elevate your style with American Crew, a leader in men's grooming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does the job and hair feels good after using it. The menthol sensation in it isn't too strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little goes a long way. Fantastic conditioner.
reviews.reviewText: After trying many conditioners over the years I finally tried American Crew. Excellent formulation that softens and conditions hair extremely well. The scent for the conditioner is unfortunately far stronger than that of the shampoo and to me a bit overpowering.However, since a small amount goes a long way in comparison to many others and it’s only two to three minutes the extra strong scent is bearable.I will definitely continue to use and it will become my go to shampoo and conditioner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Relatively Fragrance-Free and It Works
reviews.reviewText: This large bottle of conditioner is a bargain and a fine product, but might not be best for someone with a weak grip. The conditioner works very well and is rich and fragrance-free so it does not get in the way of perfumes, cologne or other scents. But the bottle, when full, is heavy and if you are using it in the shower, may require two hands to avoid dropping on your toes. It's an unbreakable bottle, but your toes are not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a very large bottle at a great price. No problems with delivery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells good, leaves my thick stupid hair feeling silky. I also love the minty cooling effect. Men, we don't treat ourselves to cosmetics often but I think this one is worthwhile

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent men's conditioner
reviews.reviewText: This is a high quality product worth the money. It has peppermint in it and it leaves your skull feeling cool and refreshed it's more than just a conditioner it's a bit of a special treatment for the head! I always look forward to cleaning and conditioning my hair now The stuff is pretty cool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My hair has never felt so soft and clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes my hair feel alive.
No pump and thick as he&$
reviews.reviewText: Thick product either put a larger flat lid on so it stand upside down or put a pump on it. Dropped it twice trying to squeeze the living crap out of it to get some product out.. first world problems I know but great product

Ich war schon lange auf der Suche nach einem richtig guten Conditioner für Männer. Die meisten Conditioner riechen nach Potpourri oder eindeutig zu weiblich für meinen Geschmack. Nichts für mich. Ich habe dann bei einem teuren Friseursalon den American Crew Conditioner ausprobieren können und war überrascht wie toll sich dieser während der Benutzung aber auch noch danach anfühlt. Ich brauchte dieses Erlebnis unbedingt für zu Hause!Meine Haare fühlen sich seit dem nicht mehr so trocken an, sehen gesund und glänzend aus.Was gibt es über diesen Conditioner noch zu sagen außer, dass er das Haar wunderbar pflegt, richtig gut duftet? Der frische Kick auf den ich mich morgens fast schon am meisten freue ist ein Erlebnis das jeder mal gemacht haben sollte. Kaufempfehlung!
